snippet: Daniel M. Gitner stopped a perfect record in insider trading cases. | Harbinger Capital Partners files a lawsuit against Dish Network over LightSquared. | The job starts now for first-year junior bankers. | John Kerry may be this year’s big guest...
abstract: Daniel M. Gitner stopped a perfect record in insider trading cases. | Harbinger Capital Partners files a lawsuit against Dish Network over LightSquared. | The job starts now for first-year junior bankers. | John Kerry may be this year’s big guest at the Allen & Company conference.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: The Defender Who Ended Prosecutors' Streak
